DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety efficacy ocular sirolimus ( rapamycin ) formulation via different injection route patient treatment-naive sub-foveal choroidal neovascularization secondary age-related macular degeneration .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 1/2 Study Ocular Sirolimus ( Rapamycin ) Formulation Patients With Age-Related Macular Degeneration
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria include , limited : Diagnosed subfoveal choroidal neovascularization secondary agerelated macular degeneration Visual acuity 20/50 20/200 study eye Any ocular disease could compromise vision study eye History prior treatment choroidal neovascularization study eye Presence cause choroidal neovascularization secondary agerelated macular degeneration
